attributes.action: Reduce the Tax on fuel (Petrol & Diesel)
attributes.additional_details: Reduce tax on fuel in April Budget if not sooner
attributes.background: Reduce the tax on petrol and diesel whilst prices spiralling out of control during the conflict in Ukraine. With all other costs and inflation it's putting real hardship on people trying to get to work and pay their taxes. Too much of the cost is Tax, it's time to reduce it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
